461020.name: The Next World Soundtrack
461020.description:
The epic soundtrack to narrative strategy adventure The Next World! This album features more than 60 minutes of hauntingly beautiful electronica from veteran composers Steve Barnes and Nicolas Lee, comprising every musical piece featured in the original game and the Planetary Exploration expansion.
